title: After updating alpha I can't open it anymore
body: Anything? I've tried opening it as an administrator, regular opening it... anything else?

replies.body:
Try launching it from the **LeagueClient.exe** file within your League directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

Let me know if this worked!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tUAq1KYh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-23T23:50:20.527+0000)
>
> Try launching it from the **LeagueClient.exe** file within your League directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).
> 
> Let me know if this worked!

wait how do you do this
Navigate to that directory (using windows explorer or File Explorer) and then launch the listed file from that directory.
